Frequently Asked Queries

Do I really need to wear armor?
Does a knight need a steed? Does a king need a crown? Do not trifle. See Mandate 7B.4. It is a matter of basic workshop safety and common decency.
Can I get a tattoo of a skull on fire?
We traffic in heraldry, not barbarism. Perhaps you'd be interested in a tasteful, microscopic rendering of a chalice? Or a very small wheat sheaf? We find these better reflect a noble character.
Is it painful?
Less painful than the shame of a large, poorly-conceived tattoo of a cartoon character. The discomfort is fleeting; the honor is eternal (and microscopic).
